title: ShredWorx.VoltaicHD.v1.2.1-DVT
description:
VoltaicHD is a video converter that allows you to
edit footage from an AVCHD camera in MicrosoftR
Movie Maker.

VoltaicHD converts your highly compressed AVCHD
files into either WMV or AVI format which WindowsR
Media Player and MicrosoftR Movie Maker can handle.

So what? Well, if you have just bought a new AVCHD
camera and want to edit the footage, you are
usually stuck with having to fork out for a new
editing package. These packages require a new-ish,
high end PC. If you don&#039;t have one of these,
VoltaicHD is your answer.

Since Voltaic HD decompresses your HD clips before
you use them in Movie Maker, your PC has a much
easier time handling the full HD clips.
